title: Update dialog boxes and pop-ups with bold technological styling using capital flow page colors

requirements.summary: Update all dialog boxes and modal components to use a bold technological visual style matching the color scheme from the GlobalCapitalFlow component (emerald/cyan gradient with dark backgrounds)
acceptanceCriteria: All modal dialogs (SubscriptionModal, ProfileSetupModal, PaymentConfirmationModal) use emerald/cyan gradient backgrounds with dark overlays
Dialog styling matches the technological aesthetic of the GlobalCapitalFlow visualization
No transparent or semi-transparent dialog boxes remain in the application

file_operations.description: Update SubscriptionModal styling to use bold technological theme with emerald (#10b981) and cyan gradient backgrounds, solid dark overlay (bg-slate-900/95), and neon glow effects matching the GlobalCapitalFlow aesthetic. Replace any transparent or translucent backgrounds with solid dark backgrounds. Add gradient accents to plan cards and payment method buttons using emerald-to-cyan gradients.

Update ProfileSetupModal styling to use bold technological theme with emerald/cyan gradient header, solid dark background (bg-slate-900/95), and neon border effects. Replace any transparent backgrounds with solid dark backgrounds. Apply emerald accent colors to form inputs and buttons, matching the capital flow page color scheme.

Update PaymentConfirmationModal styling to use bold technological theme with solid dark background (bg-slate-900/95), emerald/cyan gradient accents for success states, and red gradient accents for failure states. Add neon glow effects to status icons and action buttons. Ensure no transparent backgrounds remain.

requirements.summary: Remove all transparent backgrounds from dialog boxes and pop-ups, replacing them with solid dark backgrounds with emerald/cyan accent gradients
acceptanceCriteria: No dialog or modal component uses transparent or translucent backgrounds
All dialogs have solid backgrounds with appropriate contrast for readability
Background styling uses dark colors with emerald (#10b981) and cyan accents consistent with the capital flow page

file_operations.description: Ensure the dialog overlay and content container use solid backgrounds only. Replace any bg-opacity or backdrop-blur classes with solid bg-slate-900/95 or bg-slate-950. Add emerald/cyan border gradients and glow effects for visual interest while maintaining solid backgrounds.

Remove any transparent or semi-transparent background classes (bg-opacity, backdrop-blur). Apply solid dark backgrounds (bg-slate-900/95, bg-slate-950) to all dialog elements. Add emerald accent borders and subtle glow effects to maintain technological aesthetic.

Eliminate all transparent background properties. Apply solid dark backgrounds throughout the modal (bg-slate-900/95, bg-slate-950). Use emerald/cyan gradient accents on borders, buttons, and status indicators to maintain visual appeal without transparency.

Add or update custom utility classes for modal styling: solid dark backgrounds with emerald/cyan gradient borders, neon glow shadow effects using the existing glow utilities, and technological accent colors. Ensure global modal styles use solid backgrounds consistent with the capital flow page aesthetic.
